casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 752
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Steven D. FREDERICK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 18, 1983.
Decided May 27, 1983.
John J. Grenko, Reading (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., Reading, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
